Articles.Content:
sup

Edited November 4, 2018 by jojo5144

This is going to read strangely because I’m keeping it simple for google translate or something. We all know how glitchy it gets. (Just saying so I don’t look like I’m being mean)

——————

Hi. Not a developer. Sorry.

I think this is the wrong forum for this, use the Support section next time. 

Here is some help and information.

Most of the issues you stated have been fixed. Can you check that your game is up to date?  Developers have fixed the bouncy wheels last update. 1.4.3

I don’t know what  “new payload container picks up...” means.

Does it break apart when you undock? Do the doors go away?

 

Large ships breaking apart can be caused by several things. Docking ports getting pushed are also caused by this.

The first possible issue is poor design. Check that all parts are attached well. 

The other possible issue is “autostrut”. You can try turning this off.

The issue can also be caused by lag. Large ships that have a large amount of parts slow down your computer and this can cause ships to break. Using  timewarp can cause this also.

 

If you need or want more help you can send me a message on forums and you can post in the international forum section to get help in your own language.
